patthana23.43:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana23.43:0.3_0: There is immediately effective, inviting inspection, relevant, so that scared.
patthana23.43:1.1_0: One whose instructions are not corrupted; nor by corrupting of hope, nor by corrupting the teaching that gives rise to corrupt wishes. Worrs are corrupted, the causes and reason for the corruption of those that arise.
patthana23.43:2.1_0: One whose desire is not corrupted
